text: Suna, tomara'i to tara, yaderake allahara pathe byaya karara ahabana janano hacche, atahpara tomadera ke'u ke'u krpanata karache. Yara krpanata karache, tara nijedera prati'i krpanata karache. Allaha abhabamukta ebam tomara abhabagrastha. Yadi tomara mukha phiriye na'o, tabe tini tomadera paribarte an'ya jatike pratisthita karabena, erapara tara tomadera mata habe na.
